AT.name: 1080° Snowboarding™
AT.description: Bereite dich auf den aufregenden Nervenkitzel des Spielehits 1080° Snowboarding™ vor. Dieser Nintendo 64™-Klassiker hat eine einfache Steuerung und ist eine der überzeugendsten Snowboard-Simulationen überhaupt - und spielbar von deinem warmen Wohnzimmer aus! Der Analogstick ist eine der eindruckvollsten Neuerungen, die mit der Nintendo 64 vorgestellt wurden und wenige Spiele haben seinen Reiz so unter Beweis gestellt wie 1080° Snowboarding. Es ist die präzise Steuerung dieses Spiels, die es ermöglicht, die Highlights und den Nervenkitzel des Snowboarding auf steilen, gefährlichen Hängen bequem von dir zu Hause aus zu erleben. Acht Pisten sind zu schaffen, wobei manche Renn-Modi speziell auf Snowboard-Rennen zugeschnitten sind, während andere Renn-Modi sich auf das Ausführen von beeindruckenden Tricks konzentrieren, einer davon ist der berühmte "1080°" spin. Wenn du diesen Titel bereits auf deiner Wii™ erworben hast, führe einen System-Transfer von deiner Wii auf deine Wii U™ durch, um ein Upgrade-Sonderangebot zu erhalten. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: 1080° Snowboarding™
AU.description: Prepare to experience the thrills and chills of the ultimate extreme sport in 1080° Snowboarding™. This Nintendo 64™ classic offers one of the most accurate yet accessible snowboarding simulations around – all from the warmth of your living room! The analog stick is one of the most striking innovations introduced by the Nintendo 64, and few games demonstrate its appeal as well as 1080° Snowboarding. The precise controls allow this game to highlight the depth and thrill of snowboarding on steep, dangerous slopes from the comfort of your home. There are eight tracks to master, with some modes dedicated to snowboard races, while other modes focus on performing impressive tricks, including the famous "1080°" spin. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: 1080° Snowboarding™
BG.description: Prepare to experience the thrills and chills of the ultimate extreme sport in 1080° Snowboarding™. This Nintendo 64™ classic offers one of the most accurate yet accessible snowboarding simulations around – all from the warmth of your living room! The analog stick is one of the most striking innovations introduced by the Nintendo 64, and few games demonstrate its appeal as well as 1080° Snowboarding. The precise controls allow this game to highlight the depth and thrill of snowboarding on steep, dangerous slopes from the comfort of your home. There are eight tracks to master, with some modes dedicated to snowboard races, while other modes focus on performing impressive tricks, including the famous "1080°" spin. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: 1080° Snowboarding™
BE.description: Préparez-vous à connaître le frisson et les sueurs froides du sport extrême dans 1080° Snowboarding™. Ce classique de Nintendo 64™ vous propose l'une des simulations de snowboard les plus précises en restant toutefois accessible: et tout cela, bien au chaud. Le stick analogique est l'une des innovations les plus remarquables de la Nintendo 64 et peu de jeux montrent son utilité aussi bien que 1080° Snowboarding. Les commandes précises vous permettent d'apprécier l'intensité et le frisson du snowboard sur des pentes escarpées et des pistes dangereuses depuis le confort de votre salon. Il y a huit parcours à maîtriser : certains sont dédiés aux courses de snowboard, d'autres mettent l'accent sur la réalisation de figures impressionnantes, notamment le célèbre saut « 1080° ». Si vous possédez ce titre sur votre Wii, faites un transfert Wii™ vers votre Wii U™ afin d'obtenir la version améliorée à un prix spécial ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

CA.name: 1080º ™ Snowboarding
CA.description: Get ready to experience one of the first truly realistic snowboarding games ever created! Select from five characters, each with their own attributes and special tricks. Pick a snowboard that best suits your rider, and then head down the mountain and feel the sensation of speed that’ll make you forget all about the cold!

ES.name: 1080° Snowboarding™
ES.description: Prepárate para disfrutar de toda la acción de un deporte extremo en 1080° Snowboarding™. Este clásico de Nintendo 64™ es uno de los simuladores de snowboard más fieles y sencillos de manejar, ¡y te permite disfrutar de este deporte desde la comodidad de tu sofá! El stick analógico es una de las innovaciones más destacables de Nintendo 64, y pocos juegos reflejan su atractivo como 1080° Snowboarding. Los controles precisos de este juego permiten disfrutar de la profundidad y la emoción de esquiar en pendientes escarpadas y peligrosas desde la comodidad de tu sofá. Este título cuenta con ocho recorridos y algunos de sus modos están dedicados a las carreras de esquí, mientras que otros se centran en realizar trucos impresionantes, incluido el famoso giro "1080°". Si posees este título en tu Wii™, puedes realizar una transferencia de datos de Wii a Wii U™ y obtener una actualización a un precio especial. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: 1080° Snowboarding™
IT.description: Con 1080° Snowboarding™ potrai sperimentare le più emozionanti acrobazie di questo sport estremo. Questo classico del Nintendo 64™ è allo stesso tempo un gioco accessibile a tutti e una fedele simulazione di snowboarding... e si può giocare stando comodamente al calduccio! La levetta analogica è una delle innovazioni più importanti del Nintendo 64, e pochi altri giochi sfruttano le sue potenzialità come 1080° Snowboarding. La precisione dei controlli permette di sperimentare l'intensità e il brivido dello snowboard su pendenze ripide e pericolose comodamente da casa. Ci sono otto piste da affrontare, con alcune modalità dedicate alle gare di snowboard e altre in cui dovrai eseguire incredibili acrobazie, tra cui la famosa rotazione "1080°". Se possiedi questo titolo sulla tua console Wii™, effettua un trasferimento dati su Wii U™ per potere ottenere la versione ottimizzata a un prezzo speciale! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

LT.name: 1080° Snowboarding™

This Nintendo 64™ classic offers one of the most accurate yet accessible snowboarding simulations around – all from the warmth of your living room! MX.name: 1080º ™ Snowboarding
MX.description: ¡Disfruta de un juego de snowboard que fue pionero en el realismo! Tendrás cinco personajes de los cuales elegir, cada uno con atributos y trucos especiales. Echa un vistazo a la variedad de tablas de snowboard y elige la que vaya mejor con tu personaje y estilo. Encontrarás desafiantes pistas, elige una, ¡y siente la adrenalina con este deporte extremo!

NO.name: 1080° Snowboarding™
NO.description: Prepare to experience the thrills and chills of the ultimate extreme sport in 1080° Snowboarding™. This Nintendo 64™ classic offers one of the most accurate yet accessible snowboarding simulations around – all from the warmth of your living room! The analog stick is one of the most striking innovations introduced by the Nintendo 64, and few games demonstrate its appeal as well as 1080° Snowboarding. The precise controls allow this game to highlight the depth and thrill of snowboarding on steep, dangerous slopes from the comfort of your home. There are eight tracks to master, with some modes dedicated to snowboard races, while other modes focus on performing impressive tricks, including the famous "1080°" spin. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: 1080° Snowboarding™
NL.description: Beleef de opwinding en de koude rillingen die deze extreme sport met zich meebrengt in 1080° Snowboarding™. Deze Nintendo64™-klassieker is een van de meest realistische snowboardsimulaties, maar blijft toch toegankelijk. En dat allemaal vanuit je warme woonkamer! De analoge stick is een van de meest opmerkelijke innovaties die werd geïntroduceerd met de Nintendo 64, en weinig spellen demonstreren het nut zo goed als 1080° Snowboarding. De precisie van de besturing geeft dit spel de mogelijkheid om de diepte en de spanning van snowboarden op steile, gevaarlijke hellingen weer te geven terwijl je comfortabel thuis kunt blijven. Er zijn acht parkoersen die je je meester kunt maken, waarbij sommige spelstanden gericht zijn op snowboardraces, en andere spelstanden gericht zijn op het uitvoeren van indrukwekkende stunts, waaronder de beroemde '1080°-spin'. Als je deze titel hebt gekocht op je Wii™, kom je in aanmerking voor een speciale upgrade-prijs als je je gegevens overzet van Wii naar Wii U™. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: 1080° Snowboarding™
NZ.description: Prepare to experience the thrills and chills of the ultimate extreme sport in 1080° Snowboarding™. This Nintendo 64™ classic offers one of the most accurate yet accessible snowboarding simulations around – all from the warmth of your living room! The analog stick is one of the most striking innovations introduced by the Nintendo 64, and few games demonstrate its appeal as well as 1080° Snowboarding. The precise controls allow this game to highlight the depth and thrill of snowboarding on steep, dangerous slopes from the comfort of your home. There are eight tracks to master, with some modes dedicated to snowboard races, while other modes focus on performing impressive tricks, including the famous "1080°" spin. PL.name: 1080° Snowboarding™
PL.description: Prepare to experience the thrills and chills of the ultimate extreme sport in 1080° Snowboarding™. This Nintendo 64™ classic offers one of the most accurate yet accessible snowboarding simulations around – all from the warmth of your living room! The analog stick is one of the most striking innovations introduced by the Nintendo 64, and few games demonstrate its appeal as well as 1080° Snowboarding. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: 1080° Snowboarding™
PT.description: Prepara-te para experienciar os arrepios do derradeiro desporto radical em 1080° Snowboarding™. Este clássico para a Nintendo 64™ oferece uma das simulações de snowboard mais realistas e acessíveis de sempre. E podes desfrutar de toda a ação no conforto da tua casa! O manípulo analógico foi uma das inovações tecnológicas mais impressionantes introduzidas pela Nintendo 64, e poucos jogos demonstram o seu potencial como 1080° Snowboarding. Os controlos precisos permitem a este jogo recriar a profundidade e a adrenalina de fazer snowboard por encostas perigosas no conforto da nossa casa. Há oito pistas para dominar, com modos dedicados a corridas de snowboard e outros modos específicos para manobras, tais como a famosa rotação de 1080°. Caso já tenha adquirido este título para a sua Wii, faça uma transferência de dados da sua Wii™ para a sua Wii U™ com atualizações a um preço especial. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: 1080° Snowboarding™
RU.description: Приготовьтесь ощутить всю интенсивность одного из самых экстремальных видов спорта в 1080° Snowboarding™. Эта классическая игра для системы Nintendo 64™ является одним из самых точных, но в тоже время доступных, симуляторов сноубординга. И все это в тепле и уюте вашего домашнего очага! Аналоговый мини-джойстик является одной из самых поразительных инноваций, представленных в системе Nintendo 64. Несколько игр успешно используют весь его потенциал, включая 1080° Snowboarding. Четкое управление в этой игре позволяет игроку ощутить всю интенсивность и экстрим сноубординга, съезжая с крутых опасных склонов, находясь в тепле и уюте домашнего очага. Покорите все восемь трасс, играя в режиме состязаний или же в режимах, в которых вам нужно будет исполнять умопомрачительные трюки, включая известную спираль в 1080°. Если вы приобрели игру на Wii™, вы можете передать ее на консоль Wii U™ и получить скидку на обновление игры до версии Wii U. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

SE.description: Prepare to experience the thrills and chills of the ultimate extreme sport in 1080° Snowboarding™. This Nintendo 64™ classic offers one of the most accurate yet accessible snowboarding simulations around – all from the warmth of your living room! The analog stick is one of the most striking innovations introduced by the Nintendo 64, and few games demonstrate its appeal as well as 1080° Snowboarding. SK.name: 1080° Snowboarding™
SK.description: Prepare to experience the thrills and chills of the ultimate extreme sport in 1080° Snowboarding™. This Nintendo 64™ classic offers one of the most accurate yet accessible snowboarding simulations around – all from the warmth of your living room! The analog stick is one of the most striking innovations introduced by the Nintendo 64, and few games demonstrate its appeal as well as 1080° Snowboarding. The precise controls allow this game to highlight the depth and thrill of snowboarding on steep, dangerous slopes from the comfort of your home. There are eight tracks to master, with some modes dedicated to snowboard races, while other modes focus on performing impressive tricks, including the famous "1080°" spin. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

US.name: 1080º ™ Snowboarding
US.description: Get ready to experience one of the first truly realistic snowboarding games ever created! Select from five characters, each with their own attributes and special tricks. Pick a snowboard that best suits your rider, and then head down the mountain and feel the sensation of speed that’ll make you forget all about the cold!
